arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	--Turn on all spawners
	for i, idAllSpawner in ipairs(T_ALL_SPAWNERS) do
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idAllSpawner, false)
	end
	
	--Initiates the first wander point for the ghost. After this it will be handled in the Attack Waves phase
	UF_Wander(idSelf, idActorNPC)
	
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	
	--Plays burst vfx and an attractor that goes back to the wander soul
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idActorKilled, 4)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectDuration(idActorKilled, 1)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor(idActorKilled, idWanderingSoul, S_FX_GHOSTROPE)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorKilled, S_FX_GHOSTBURST, true)
	
	--Update bonus obj tracker 
	if Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(94) > 850 then
		Hydra.QuestCallbackCountSet(94, 1000)
	else
		Hydra.QuestCallbackCountSet(94, Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(94) + 150)
	end
end

function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)
	if bBonusAchieved == false then
		--Remove progress from the tracker when the wandering soul is hit.
		if Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(94) < 10 then
			Hydra.QuestCallbackCountSet(94, 0)
		else
			Hydra.QuestCallbackCountSet(94, Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(94) - 10)
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActor)
	--After reaching the wander point, it wanders again
	Hydra.Wait(0.1)
	UF_Wander(idSelf, idActor)
end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
-- Bonus has been achieved.
bBonusAchieved = true
Hydra.EventSend("BonusSuccess", idSelf)

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(flTimeElapsed)

-- Find a random monster.
	local nTotalMonsters = Hydra.ActorGroupGetCount(S_ALLMONSTERS)
	local nRandomMonster = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, nTotalMonsters)
	idSelectedMonster = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_ALLMONSTERS)[nRandomMonster]
	
-- Set that monster to force target the wandering soul.	
	if bBonusAchieved == false then
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSelectedMonster) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idSelectedMonster) then
			Hydra.ActorAIForcePrimaryTarget(idSelectedMonster, idWanderingSoul)
		end
	end

end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
-- If the bonus wasn't achieved then move to the next phase
if bBonusAchieved == false then
	Hydra.EventSend("BonusFailed", idSelf)
	Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()
else
--Plays ghost conversation
	Hydra.QActorStopAllQueuedActions(idWanderingSoul)
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_SUCCESS, idWanderingSoul)
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	
	--fades ghost into the elite after ghost conversation
	Hydra.ActorWarpToActor(idSuperEliteSpawnMarker, idWanderingSoul)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idWanderingSoul, S_FX_GHOSTBURST)
	Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(idWanderingSoul, 0.25)
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_ELITE_SPAWNER, false)
end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
-- Function to disable all the spawners
CleanupPrep(idSelf)

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	--Fade ghost; Enable chest
	Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(idActorNPC, 1)
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idChestNormal, false)
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	--Apply ghost effect on soul eaters
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idActorSpawned, 4)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorSpawned, S_FX_GHOSTFILLED, true, Hydra.ACDID_INVALID, "HP_chest")
	
	--Force it to target the wandering soul.
	Hydra.ActorAIForcePrimaryTarget(idActorSpawned, idWanderingSoul)
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	--Apply ghost effect on soul eaters
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idActorSpawned, 4)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorSpawned, S_FX_GHOSTFILLED, true, Hydra.ACDID_INVALID, "HP_chest")
end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
-- Sets the DRLG designer variable so the chest encounter spawns the correct one.
	Hydra.SetGameVariableNumeric("DE_ChestRewardRare", 1)

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start()

--Turn on the reward chest
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idChestNormal, false)

end

szUserFunctionsScript:
---------------------------------
-- Destroy spawners in a table --
function CleanupPrep(questID)

	for i, idAllSpawner in ipairs(T_ALL_SPAWNERS) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAllSpawner) then 
			Hydra.ActorKill(idAllSpawner)
		end
	end
end

------------------
-- Ghost Wander --
function UF_Wander(idSelf, idActor)
	
	-- Get a random position in relation to the quest location
	local ptSelfPos = Hydra.ActorGetPosition(idSelf)
	local ptWalkPos = Hydra.PositionOffsetRandomly(ptSelfPos, 0, 8)
	
	-- Have ths ghost move to the picked location
	Hydra.QActorMoveToPositionConstantSpeed(idActor, ptWalkPos, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_WALK)
end
szOnStartupScript:
-- ======= VARIABLES =======
--	General
	S_EVENT_PROGRESS = "DE_Standard_WanderingSoul_Progress"
	S_EVENT_FAILURE = "DE_Standard_WanderingSoul_Failure"
	
--	BonusTracker
	bBonusAchieved = false

	--Enables initial Soul Imbued enemies to familiarize the player with the unusual appearance
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_STARTING_SPAWNER, false)
